ygData.subject: Re: Locked Book
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Here is the quest: Lydl Mastat:  A wizard guildmaster at the top floor of the arcane science building wants to teach an apprentice named Lydl Mastat a
ygData.messageBody:
TkAdam@... wrote:

> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 6/8/99 3:27:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> VorteksJRC@... writes:
>
> > Does anyone know what I can do with this?
>
> I believe that there is a quest in the Wizards guild in Freeport that uses
> that book. So I think it is a quest item. (not 100% sure ... but I remember
> a quest asking me to get a book from Lord (sombody).
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder
>

Here is the quest:

Lydl Mastat: A wizard guildmaster at the top floor of the arcane science building wants to
teach an apprentice named Lydl Mastat a lesson. You are supposed to find Lydl and kill him
and return whatever he has to this NPC. He can sometimes be found outside the South Gate to
the newbie zone of East Freeport near a couple of cacti. His is approximately level 5.

I have the book to, but haven't been able to find out which guildmaster the quest originates from. I guess he won't give me the quest because a) I'm to high of a level or b) He won't give me the quest since I already have the book. If anybody
knows the specific guild masters name I'd appreciate it too.

Cheers
Malkin
